Package Bank

Class CentralBank

java.lang.Object
Bank.CentralBank
All Implemented Interfaces:
Searchable, Transactable
public class CentralBank extends Object implements Transactable, Searchable
Represents a central bank that manages customers and their respective accounts. Implements the functionalities provided by Transactable and Searchable interfaces.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CentralBank()
    Initializes an instance of the CentralBank with empty lists of customers and accounts.
